resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73617</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73617</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40c87b29-1038-42ce-2e38-e3a865674b07#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A művészet szó történetisége</string>
            <string language="en">the history of the word art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Geschichte der Wortkunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'histoire de l'art de mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o history da arte da palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la storia di arte di parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ιστορία της τέχνης λέξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la historia del arte de la palabra</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Mit takar, mit jelöl a művészet, mint gyűjtőfogalom. A művészet hagyomány és választás kérdése</string>
            <string language="en">What does it contain, what does it indicate art as a collective term. art is the question of choice and tradition</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">művészet elmélet,  </string>
            <string language="en">art theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was es enthält, was es kunst anzeigt, da eine 
Kollektivbezeichnung kunst die Frage der Wahl und der Tradition ist</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce qui il contient, ce qui il indique l'art car un
art collectif de limite est la question du choix et de la tradition</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O que ele contem, o que ele indica a arte porque 
uma arte coletiva do termo é a pergunta da escolha e da tradição</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa esso contiene, che cosa esso indica 
l'arte poichè un'arte collettiva di termine è la domanda della 
scelta e della tradizione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό που αυτό περιέχει, τι αυτό δείχνει την τέχνη ως
συλλογική τέχνη όρου είναι το θέμα της επιλογής και παράδοση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué él contiene, qué él indica arte pues un 
arte colectivo del término es la cuestión de la opción y de la 
tradición</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kunsttheorie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">théorie d'art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teoria da arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">teoria di arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θεωρία τέχνης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">teoría del arte</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73617</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

  </manifestation>
